attributes.additional_details: TO CHANGE THE LAW WHERE COMPAINES WHO OWN AND OPERATE OUTSIDE THE UK SUBSIDERIES TO BE FULLY RESPONCIBLE FOR THE CIVIL RIGHTS AND EMPLOYMENT CONTRACTS SET UP AND OFFERED BY THE SUBSIDRIES AS WELL AS ANY SHORT FALLS IN SALARIES AND / OR WHERE OWED BY THE SUBSIDERIES. THE PEOPLE ARE SUFFERING BECAUSE OF THE LAWS CURRENTLY APPLICABLE TO ALLW THE SUBSIDERIES TO ESCAPE FROM LEGAL OR STATE ACTION
